definition: colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: These words seems so lonely, like those roaming dogs in streets.
sentences.chinese: 它們那麼寥落，象是倉皇街上的流浪狗。

sentences.english: Order under the moss and mangrove, Sparse rain in mid-depression.
sentences.chinese: 階下青苔與紅樹，雨中寥落月中愁。

sentences.english: The pine trees and cypresses, sparsely dotted on the hillside, seem to be clearer in sight.
sentences.chinese: 山腰裏的寥落松柏也似乎看得清楚了。

sentences.english: A mountain temple. Clear water running under the verandah. Moss on the side.
sentences.chinese: 寥落山中寺，清幽廊下碧水深，廊外映苔痕。

sentences.chinese: 用爽膚水再次潔淨殘留在毛孔中的面膜及寥落的角質。

sentences.english: A cold, low whistle; accompanies my last breath; wind in sympathy.
sentences.chinese: 寥落乎餘響，尚存一息隨之逝，悲風共淒涼。
